thread.title: High school athlete dies from cardiac arrest in Maryland | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: High school athlete dies from cardiac arrest in Maryland | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: High school athlete dies from cardiac arrest in Maryland | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Shock as high school athlete dies from cardiac arrest aged 17 after battling the flu for five days Kayla Linton of Baltimore, Maryland, battled the flu before she went into cardiac arrest and died on Saturday, her mother said Her sudden death left family heartbroken, prompting outpouring of support Students at the Lansdowne High School, where Linton played lacrosse, field hockey and basketball, made posters, t-shirts and ribbons they wore in her honor Teens also enlisted the help of their friends from around the world to pay tribute The athletic director called her 'the sunshine of the school' while her mom said: 'Kayla was the happiest, most cheerful, loving person' Published: 16:38 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 21:09 GMT, 1 February 2017 356 shares
